Accepted Currencies Reference. When no accepted currencies are passed in the web service, the bank account will accept all currencies.

If no payment type is specified, Workday will populate this with the customer's default payment type if one is defined.  Typically this is only populated when it is an electronic payment type whose collection  would be initiated by Workday.
Boolean flag indicating if the Petty Cash Account is usable for Cash payments
Boolean flag indicating if the Petty Cash Account is usable for Customer payments
Boolean flag indicating if the Petty Cash Account is usable for Expense payments
Boolean flag indicating if the Petty Cash Account is usable for Payroll payments
Boolean flag indicating if the Petty Cash Account is usable for Supplier payments
Boolean flag indicating if the Petty Cash Account is usable for Intercompany payments
Boolean flag indicating if the Petty Cash Account is usable for Ad Hoc payments
Indicates that the account can be used for Bank Account Transfer for Settlement
Boolean flag indicating if the Petty Cash Account is usable for Off-Cycle Payroll payments
Indicates whether the petty cash account is usable for pay on-demand payments.
Boolean flag indicating if the Petty Cash Account is usable for Prenote payments
Indicates that the account can be used for Miscellaneous Payments
Boolean indicating if the bank account can be used for additional usages
This is the bank account security segment for the bank account. If segmented security is set up for bank accounts, these segments indicate the security for the bank account.

Accepted_Currencies_Reference.description: Accepted Currencies Reference. When no accepted currencies are passed in the web service, the bank account will accept all currencies.

Allow_Additional_usage.description: Boolean indicating if the bank account can be used for additional usages

Bank_Account_Security_Segment_Reference.description: This is the bank account security segment for the bank account. If segmented security is set up for bank accounts, these segments indicate the security for the bank account.

Payment_Type_Reference.description: If no payment type is specified, Workday will populate this with the customer's default payment type if one is defined.  Typically this is only populated when it is an electronic payment type whose collection  would be initiated by Workday.

Petty_Cash_Account_ID.description: Petty Cash Account ID. This is the Petty Cash Account unique identifier

Used_by_Ad_hoc_Payments.description: Boolean flag indicating if the Petty Cash Account is usable for Ad Hoc payments

Used_by_Off-Cycle_Payroll.description: Boolean flag indicating if the Petty Cash Account is usable for Off-Cycle Payroll payments

Used_by_Pay_On_Demand.description: Indicates whether the petty cash account is usable for pay on-demand payments.

Used_by_Payroll.description: Boolean flag indicating if the Petty Cash Account is usable for Payroll payments
